name: FootPool
description:
FootPool is an original pool game that mixes with the rules of soccer
The game presents a pool table with the characteristics of a soccer field, where 2 soccer teams are made up of billiard balls, which, just like in real soccer, the teams start lined up on their own playing field. The ball, just like in soccer, is placed in the middle of the field where each team will have to hit in turn with the aim of converting Goals!
